title: 2 Methods for Changing the Hotspot Name on Your Phone

steps.title: Open Settings.
steps.content: Open Settings. Tap the app icon that looks like a pair of gears on a light grey background. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap General.
steps.content: Tap General . It's usually the first item in the menu next to a gear icon. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap About.
steps.content: Tap About . You'll see this at the top of the menu in the "General" settings. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Name.
steps.content: Tap Name . The default might be something like "iPhone" or "[Your Name]'s iPhone." [4] X Research source

steps.title: Delete the current text and enter the new name.
steps.content: Delete the current text and enter the new name. To delete what's already there, tap the x button then use the keyboard to enter a new name. When you're done, tap done on your keyboard. This will change both your iPhone's name as well as the hotspot name. [5] X Research source To change your hotspot's password, go to Settings > Cellular > Personal Hotspot > Wi-Fi Password and enter the new password.

steps.title: Open Settings.
steps.content: Open Settings. You can do this by tapping the gear app icon or by tapping the gear icon in the Quick Menu that opens when you swipe down from the top of your screen. [6] X Research source This method varies depending on the model of phone you have, but all the steps are similar.

steps.title: Tap Wireless & Networks.
steps.content: Tap Wireless & Networks . It's usually next to a networked globe icon. Some phones, like the Samsung Galaxy, say "Connections" instead. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Hotspot & Tethering option.
steps.content: Tap the Hotspot & Tethering option. This might be called "Mobile Hotspot and Tethering" instead. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Wi-Fi hotspot.
steps.content: Tap Wi-Fi hotspot . This might be "Mobile Hotspot" instead and you'll see your hotspot's details. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap your hotspot's name or Configure.
steps.content: Tap your hotspot's name or Configure . If you tapped Configure , you'll need to tap the Network name field to edit it. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Give your hotspot a new name.
steps.content: Give your hotspot a new name. Press the backspace arrow on your keyboard to erase the existing text and then you can enter a new name. [11] X Research source You can also tap the "Password" field to change the current password that you have set for your hotspot.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Make sure you save this changed information before you close out of the menu.
